import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './landing.css'; import carbonara from '../assets/carbonara.jpg'; import salmon from '../assets/salmon.jpg'; import heroImg from '../assets/hero.jpg'; import bgBehind from '../assets/clom.jpg'; import Features from './Features'; export default function Landing() { // debug asset paths in browser console to confirm imports try { console.log('asset paths:', { carbonara, salmon, heroImg }); } catch (e) {} // Scroll animation observer React.useEffect(() => { const observerOptions = { threshold: 0.1, rootMargin: '0px 0px -50px 0px' }; const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => { entries.forEach(entry => { if (entry.isIntersecting) { entry.target.classList.add('in-view'); } }); }, observerOptions); document.querySelectorAll('.animate-on-scroll').forEach(el => { observer.observe(el); }); return () => observer.disconnect(); }, []); return ( <>

{/* AI Recipe Generator Section */}
AI-Powered

Generate Recipes with Artificial Intelligence

Simply tell us what ingredients you have, and our advanced AI will create unique, delicious recipes tailored just for you. No more food waste, just creative cooking!

Smart Recipe Generation

AI analyzes your ingredients and creates custom recipes instantly

Dietary Preferences

Specify dietary restrictions and get perfectly matched recipes

Nutrition Analysis

Automatic calorie and macro calculation for every recipe

Try AI Recipe Generator

Garlic Chicken & Broccoli Stir-Fry

A delicious Asian-inspired dish with tender chicken, crispy broccoli, and aromatic garlic served over fluffy rice.

{/* How It Works Section */}

How HomePlate Works

Your journey to culinary excellence in 3 simple steps

1

Create & Store

Add your favorite recipes or generate new ones with our AI-powered recipe generator. Store unlimited recipes in the cloud.

2

Organize & Track

Automatically calculate nutrition facts, categorize recipes, and track your cooking journey with detailed analytics.

3

Share & Discover

Join our community to share your creations and discover amazing recipes from cooks around the world.

{/* Features Section */} {/* Testimonials Section */}
